descriptionHtml:
a-My language is terrible i know and sorry for this.
b-I have a potato please add some good quality SS lol
c-I am not a mod maker so If you have problems please try LOOT or MO and help each other
d-No specific Achilles shield but banded iron shield is good enough
(PS:I asked permission but I did not get an answer.If there is a problem this file will be send to the Oblivion immediately)
[img]http://www.fliwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/Achilles2.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Required Mods (Download and install them first)[/size][/color]
1- [size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32546/?]Achilles Armor[/url] [/size]  by  [size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6244485]FurrySwords[/url][/size] 
2-(For helmet) [color=#0000ff][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30649/?]Ancient Greek Steel Armor UNP[/url]  [/size][/color]by  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1330377][size=3]sirwho[/size][/url] 
-----------
3-İnstall my file and owerwrite ([size=3]For armor data-textures-armor-achilles /For helmet data-textures-sirwho-greek armor[/size])
[img]https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/99/96/a7/9996a704a9ffbd6bcb6380f81e595451.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]How to Aquire the Armor[/size]

[/color][/b]-Achilles Armor-

[color=#ff0000]- You will find the armor at Bleak Falls Barrow - Sanctum or 
- Press ~ to open up console
- Type help "Achilles" and press enter
- You should see a list of all 3 items and their numerical codes
- Type player.additem ......... 1 and replace the dots with the code of the item you want to spawn
- Do this for all 3 pieces.

[/color]-For Helmet-

[b]Option 1:[/b]
[color=#ff0000]-Craft it at the forge with the steel armor crafting skill![/color]

[b]Option 2:[/b]
[color=#ff0000]- Press ~ to open up console
- Type [i]help "Ancient Steel"[/i] and press enter
- You should see a list of all 5 items and their numerical codes
- Type [i]player.additem ........ 1[/i] and replace the dots with the code of [size=4]Ancient Steel Crested Helmet[/size]  want to spawn

[/color][size=4](PS:[/size][size=4]perhaps you might be interested [color=#0000ff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64215/?]Greek Armor Revamped[/url][/color][/size][size=4] (New version of Ancient Greek Steel Armor) [/size]

[b][color=#0000ff][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color][/b]
[size=6]All hail[/size] [color=#00ffff][size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6244485]FurrySwords[/url] [/size][/color]and  [size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1330377]sirwho[/url] for all these beauties !!![/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=6]ENJOY!![/size][/color]
author: RolloTheBerserker
